entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snow level 2100 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snow level rising to 1900 metres in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
